original: @94b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @94b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:🔽Ekāsmṛtyupadesa

original: ae ka smri ti au pa de sha / bod skad du /
analyzed: ae ka smri ti au pa de sha / bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:🔽The Instruction on One Mindfulness

original: dran pa gcig pa'i man ngag / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dran pa gcig pa'i man ngag / bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Lord of the World.

original: thams cad mkhyen la gus btud de //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen la gus btud de //
translated: Having bowed with devotion to the Omniscient One,

original: 'phags pa klu sgrub phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: 'phags pa klu sgrub phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: and having paid homage to Ārya Nāgārjuna,

original: aa ba dh'u t'i bdag gis ni //
analyzed: aa ba dh'u t'i bdag gis ni //
translated: I, the master of the avadhūti,

original: cig car 'jug pa'i man ngag bri //
analyzed: cig car 'jug pa'i man ngag bri //
translated: will write the instruction on instantaneous entry.

original: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
analyzed: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: Here, from the time a bodhisattva first generates the mind of awakening

original: dbang bskur chen po ma thob kyi bar de srid du de'i bya ba ni gnyis te /
analyzed: dbang bskur chen po ma thob kyi bar de srid du de'i bya ba ni gnyis te /
translated: up to the point of receiving the great empowerment, there are two things to be done:

original: shes rab kyi bya ba dang / thabs kyi bya ba'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyi bya ba dang / thabs kyi bya ba'o //
translated: the activity of wisdom and the activity of method.

original: de la shes rab ni chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa dang po nyid nas chos kyi dbyings nyid du shes pa'o //
analyzed: de la shes rab ni chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa dang po nyid nas chos kyi dbyings nyid du shes pa'o //
translated: Therein, wisdom is the knowledge that all phenomena are primordially unborn and are from the very beginning the basic space of phenomena.

original: de'i bya ba ni las dang po pa de nyid nas ji srid dbang bskur ba ma thob kyi bar de srid du nyin mtshan dus rtag tu de nyid bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: de'i bya ba ni las dang po pa de nyid nas ji srid dbang bskur ba ma thob kyi bar de srid du nyin mtshan dus rtag tu de nyid bsgom pa'o //
translated: Its function is that, from the very beginning of the career, until the consecration, one always meditates on it day and night.

original: thabs ni sems can mi gtong ba'i byang chub kyi sems so //
analyzed: thabs ni sems can mi gtong ba'i byang chub kyi sems so //
translated: The means is the thought of enlightenment which does not abandon beings.

original: de'i bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba thams cad sems can thams cad kyi ched ma yin pa ci yang med de /
analyzed: de'i bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba thams cad sems can thams cad kyi ched ma yin pa ci yang med de /
translated: Its function is that there is nothing whatsoever which is not for the sake of all beings, in all the activities of body, speech, and mind.

original: dngos sam brgyud pas so //
analyzed: dngos sam brgyud pas so //
translated: This is either directly or indirectly.

original: 'di yang sems can la dmigs pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang sems can la dmigs pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: This also has the order of the object of the thought of enlightenment and the non-object.

original: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i rim pa ni 'di yin te /
translated: The order is this:

original: mi mkhas pa rab rib can dang / mkhas pa rab rib dangs pa'o //
analyzed: mi mkhas pa rab rib can dang / mkhas pa rab rib dangs pa'o //
translated: The ignorant one with cataracts, and the wise one with clear vision.

original: gang gi tshe chos kyi sku mngon sum @95a * //
analyzed: gang gi tshe chos kyi sku mngon sum @95a * //
translated: When one has realized the Dharma Body,

original: du mdzad phan chad shes rab mnga' ste ye shes nyid du gyur nas gnas so //
analyzed: du mdzad phan chad shes rab mnga' ste ye shes nyid du gyur nas gnas so //
translated: after that, one has wisdom, and one abides in the state of being a wisdom being.

original: shes rab kyi bya ba ni mi mnga' ste goms nas mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes rab kyi bya ba ni mi mnga' ste goms nas mthar phyin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The function of wisdom is not to be present, because one has become accustomed to it and has reached the end.

original: thabs de'i bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa /
analyzed: thabs de'i bya ba ni dmigs pa med pa /
translated: The activity of that method is without a referential object,

original: rang gi ngang gis lhun gyis grub pa dang / 'bad pa dang rtsol ba med par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rang gi ngang gis lhun gyis grub pa dang / 'bad pa dang rtsol ba med par 'byung ngo //
translated: arises spontaneously, and occurs without effort or exertion.

original: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas ni gang zag gi bdag yod pas sems can zhes brtags shing des sdug bsngal ba la snying rje bskyed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas ni gang zag gi bdag yod pas sems can zhes brtags shing des sdug bsngal ba la snying rje bskyed do //
translated: A bodhisattva who is a beginner, because of the existence of a self of persons, imagines sentient beings and generates compassion for their suffering.

original: des na goms nas ni sems can zhes bya ba ni dang po nyid nas med kyi /
analyzed: des na goms nas ni sems can zhes bya ba ni dang po nyid nas med kyi /
translated: Then, through familiarity, they realize that what is called a “sentient being” does not exist from the very beginning.

original: glo bur du ming du btags par zad do //
analyzed: glo bur du ming du btags par zad do //
translated: It is merely a name that is temporarily imputed.🔽Otherwise, they realize that apart from the mere aggregates, elements, and sense bases of dependent arising, there is nothing else here.

original: gzhan du na rten 'brel gyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched tsam zhig las gzhan 'di na ci yang med do snyam du rtogs pa dang / yang 'di dag ni rang gi sems 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi /
analyzed: gzhan du na rten 'brel gyi phung po dang khams dang skye mched tsam zhig las gzhan 'di na ci yang med do snyam du rtogs pa dang / yang 'di dag ni rang gi sems 'ba' zhig tu zad kyi /
translated: And they realize that these are only one’s own mind.🔽Apart from that, there is nothing else here.

original: gzhan 'di na ci yang med do snyam du rtogs na des sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje skye'o //
analyzed: gzhan 'di na ci yang med do snyam du rtogs na des sdug bsngal ba rnams la snying rje skye'o //
translated: When they realize that, compassion arises for those who suffer.

original: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi dmigs pa'i yul med de /
analyzed: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi dmigs pa'i yul med de /
translated: At the time of the buddha level, there is no object of nonreferential wisdom.

original: 'phags pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas zhus pa las ji skad du /
analyzed: 'phags pa rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pas zhus pa las ji skad du /
translated: As the noble Questions of Suvikrāntavikrāmin says,

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyis ci yang mi gzigs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyis ci yang mi gzigs te /
translated: “The wisdom of the buddha bhagavāns does not see anything at all.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: ye shes kyi yul mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ye shes kyi yul mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so //
translated: Because it does not have an object of wisdom.”

original: 'o na dus de na ye shes yod dam med ce na /
analyzed: 'o na dus de na ye shes yod dam med ce na /
translated: Well then, does wisdom exist or not at that time?

original: 'phags pa klu sgrub mi bzhed de /
analyzed: 'phags pa klu sgrub mi bzhed de /
translated: The noble Nāgārjuna does not assert that.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As he says:🔽The mind is not seen

original: sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
analyzed: sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
translated: by all the buddhas,🔽is not seen,

original: ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs mi 'gyur //
translated: and will not be seen.🔽How could they see

original: rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin la //🔽ci lta bu zhig gzigs par 'gyur //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin la // ci lta bu zhig gzigs par 'gyur //
translated: the nature that has no nature?

original: zhes gsungs pa dang / brgyud pa'i man ngag 'di yin no ;
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa dang / brgyud pa'i man ngag 'di yin no ;
translated: This is the oral instruction of the lineage.

original: / des na gzhan gyi don las ma gtogs pa bya ba gzhan ci yang mi mnga' la /
analyzed: / des na gzhan gyi don las ma gtogs pa bya ba gzhan ci yang mi mnga' la /
translated: Therefore, except for the welfare of others, the Buddha has no other activity at all.

original: 'di ltar gzhan gyi don ni 'dod par bya ba'i don gyi 'bras bu'i gtso bo yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan gyi don ni 'dod par bya ba'i don gyi 'bras bu'i gtso bo yin te /
translated: Thus, the benefit of others is the principal result of the purpose to be accomplished.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
analyzed: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
translated: The noble Nagarjuna said:

original: gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa ni //
analyzed: gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa ni //
translated: The perfection of the benefit of others

original: 'bras bu'i gtso bo yin par 'dod //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i gtso bo yin par 'dod //
translated: is considered the principal result.

original: sangs rgyas nyid sogs de las gzhan //
analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid sogs de las gzhan //
translated: Buddhahood and so forth are other than that,

original: de dag don gyi 'bras bur 'dod //🔽ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de dag don gyi 'bras bur 'dod // ces gsungs so //
translated: considered the results of that purpose.

original: de kho na nyid la 'jug pa'i man ngag kyang blo la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid la 'jug pa'i man ngag kyang blo la gnas par bya'o //
translated: The instructions for engaging reality should also be kept in mind.

original: tshul khrims rgyal bas bskul ba yis //
analyzed: tshul khrims rgyal bas bskul ba yis //
translated: Here, the morality urged by the Victor

original: 'dir ni bsdus nas bstan pa yin //
analyzed: 'dir ni bsdus nas bstan pa yin //
translated: is taught in a condensed form.🔽For an extensive explanation,

original: rgyas par klu sgrub gdams @95b ngag dang // theg chen mdo sde lta bar gyis //
analyzed: rgyas par klu sgrub gdams @95b ngag dang // theg chen mdo sde lta bar gyis //
translated: consult the instructions of Nagarjuna and the Mahayana sutras.

original: ci car 'jug pa'i man ngag pandi ta d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: ci car 'jug pa'i man ngag pandi ta d'i pam ka ra shr'i dzny'a nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The instructions for engaging in the precepts composed by the pandit Dipamkarasrtjftana is completed.

original: // / pandi ta de nyid dang lo ts'a ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o //
analyzed: // / pandi ta de nyid dang lo ts'a ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o //
translated: It was translated by the pandit himself and the translator Tsultrim Gyalwa.
